Player History
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/3/1967 to a 3-year deal worth $6,123,456 per year...
Traded from California to Philadelphia on 3/2/1967 (Going to PHI: P D. Baldwin. Going to CAL: SS B. Wine)...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/15/1969 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 9/9/1971, off Aurelio Lopez (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/2/1975 to a 1-year deal worth $5,650,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 2/5/1975...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/11/1975 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
